hard_constraints.translation: If I watch my diet, I will maintain good health.
hard_constraints.evidence: If I watch my diet, I will maintain good health.
hard_constraints.reasoning: The text states a conditional relationship between watching diet and maintaining good health.

hard_constraints.translation: If I consume excessive junk food, I will become more susceptible to illnesses.
hard_constraints.evidence: If I consume excessive junk food, I will become more susceptible to illnesses.
hard_constraints.reasoning: The text states a conditional relationship between consuming junk food and susceptibility to illnesses.

hard_constraints.translation: Either I am committed to watching my diet or I am not prone to illnesses.
hard_constraints.evidence: We know that either I am committed to watching my diet or I am not prone to illnesses.
hard_constraints.reasoning: The text explicitly states that one of these statements must be true.

soft_constraints.translation: It is possible that I am only dedicated to maintaining a healthy diet, or alternatively, I may not be prone to illnesses, or even both statements could be true.
soft_constraints.evidence: It is possible that I am only dedicated to maintaining a healthy diet, or alternatively, I may not be prone to illnesses, or even both statements could be true.
